verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, <S%H1697><s%> when the wrath <S%H2534><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> was appeased, <S%H7918><s%> he remembered <S%H2142><s%> Vashti, <S%H2060><s%> and what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> she had done, <S%H6213><s%> and what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> was decreed <S%H1504><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her.

Then said <S%H559><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> servants <S%H5288><s%> that ministered <S%H8334><s%> to him, Let there be fair <S%H2896><s%> <S%H4758><s%> young <S%H5291><s%> virgins <S%H1330><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> for the king: <S%H4428><s%>

And let the king <S%H4428><s%> appoint <S%H6485><s%> officers <S%H6496><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the provinces <S%H4082><s%> of his kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> that they may gather <S%H6908><s%> together all <S%H3605><s%> the fair <S%H2896><s%> <S%H4758><s%> young <S%H5291><s%> virgins <S%H1330><s%> to Shushan <S%H7800><s%> the palace, <S%H1002><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the women, <S%H802><s%> to the custody <S%H3027><s%> of Hege <S%H1896><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> chamberlain, <S%H5631><s%> keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the women; <S%H802><s%> and let their things <S%H1697><s%> for purification <S%H8562><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> them:

And let the maiden <S%H5291><s%> which <S%H834><s%> pleases <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> be queen <S%H4427><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Vashti. <S%H2060><s%> And the thing <S%H1697><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> the king; <S%H4428><s%> and he did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3651><s%>

Now in Shushan <S%H7800><s%> the palace <S%H1002><s%> there was a certain <S%H376><s%> Jew, <S%H3064><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jair, <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimei, <S%H8096><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish, <S%H7027><s%> a Benjamite; <S%H1145><s%>

Who <S%H834><s%> had been carried <S%H1540><s%> away <S%H1546><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with the captivity <S%H1473><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had been carried <S%H1540><s%> away <S%H1546><s%> with Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had carried <S%H1540><s%> away. <S%H1546><s%>

And he brought <S%H539><s%> up Hadassah, <S%H1919><s%> that is, Esther, <S%H635><s%> his uncle's <S%H1733><s%> daughter: <S%H1323><s%> for she had neither <S%H369><s%> father <S%H1><s%> nor mother, <S%H517><s%> and the maid <S%H5291><s%> was fair <S%H3303><s%> <S%H8389><s%> and beautiful; <S%H2896><s%> <S%H4758><s%> whom Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> when her father <S%H1><s%> and mother <S%H517><s%> were dead, <S%H4194><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> for his own daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

So it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when the king's <S%H4428><s%> commandment <S%H1697><s%> and his decree <S%H1881><s%> was heard, <S%H8085><s%> and when many <S%H7227><s%> maidens <S%H5291><s%> were gathered <S%H6908><s%> together to Shushan <S%H7800><s%> the palace, <S%H1002><s%> to the custody <S%H3027><s%> of Hegai, <S%H1896><s%> that Esther <S%H635><s%> was brought <S%H3947><s%> also to the king's <S%H4428><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> to the custody <S%H3027><s%> of Hegai, <S%H1896><s%> keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the women. <S%H802><s%>

And the maiden <S%H5291><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> him, and she obtained <S%H5375><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> of him; and he speedily <S%H926><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> her her things <S%H1697><s%> for purification, <S%H8562><s%> with such things <S%H1697><s%> as belonged <S%H4490><s%> to her, and seven <S%H7651><s%> maidens, <S%H5291><s%> which were meet <S%H7200><s%> to be given <S%H5414><s%> her, out of the king's <S%H4428><s%> house: <S%H1004><s%> and he preferred <S%H8138><s%> her and her maids <S%H5291><s%> to the best <S%H2896><s%> place of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the women. <S%H802><s%>

Esther <S%H635><s%> had not showed <S%H5046><s%> her people <S%H5971><s%> nor her kindred: <S%H4138><s%> for Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> had charged <S%H6680><s%> her that she should not show <S%H5046><s%> it.

And Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> every day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> of the women's <S%H802><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> how Esther <S%H635><s%> did, <S%H7965><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> should become <S%H6213><s%> of her.

Then thus <S%H2088><s%> came <S%H935><s%> every maiden <S%H5291><s%> to the king; <S%H4428><s%> whatever <S%H853><s%> she desired <S%H559><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> her to go <S%H935><s%> with her out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the women <S%H802><s%> to the king's <S%H4428><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

In the evening <S%H6153><s%> she went, <S%H935><s%> and on the morrow <S%H1242><s%> she returned <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of the women, <S%H802><s%> to the custody <S%H3027><s%> of Shaashgaz, <S%H8190><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> chamberlain, <S%H5631><s%> which kept <S%H8104><s%> the concubines: <S%H6370><s%> she came <S%H935><s%> in to the king <S%H4428><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more, <S%H5750><s%> except <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> delighted <S%H2654><s%> in her, and that she were called <S%H7121><s%> by name. <S%H8034><s%>

Now when the turn <S%H8447><s%> of Esther, <S%H635><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Abihail <S%H32><s%> the uncle <S%H1730><s%> of Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> her for his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> was come <S%H5060><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> in to the king, <S%H4428><s%> she required <S%H1245><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1697><s%> but what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> Hegai <S%H1896><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> chamberlain, <S%H5631><s%> the keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the women, <S%H802><s%> appointed. <S%H559><s%> And Esther <S%H635><s%> obtained <S%H5375><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> them that looked <S%H6437><s%> on her.

So Esther <S%H635><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> royal <S%H4438><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> which is the month <S%H2320><s%> Tebeth, <S%H2887><s%> in the seventh <S%H7651><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of his reign. <S%H4438><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Esther <S%H635><s%> above all <S%H3605><s%> the women, <S%H802><s%> and she obtained <S%H5375><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> and favor <S%H2617><s%> in his sight <S%H6440><s%> more than all <S%H3605><s%> the virgins; <S%H1330><s%> so that he set <S%H7760><s%> the royal <S%H4438><s%> crown <S%H3804><s%> on her head, <S%H7218><s%> and made her queen <S%H4427><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Vashti. <S%H2060><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> feast <S%H4960><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> his princes <S%H8269><s%> and his servants, <S%H5650><s%> even <S%H853><s%> Esther's <S%H635><s%> feast; <S%H4960><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> a release <S%H2010><s%> to the provinces, <S%H4082><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> gifts, <S%H4864><s%> according to the state <S%H3027><s%> of the king. <S%H4428><s%>
And when the virgins <S%H1330><s%> were gathered <S%H6908><s%> together the second <S%H8145><s%> time, then Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> in the king's <S%H4428><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%>

Esther <S%H635><s%> had not yet showed <S%H5046><s%> her kindred <S%H4138><s%> nor her people; <S%H5971><s%> as Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> had charged <S%H6680><s%> her: for Esther <S%H635><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the commandment <S%H3982><s%> of Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> like as when <S%H834><s%> she was brought <S%H539><s%> up with him.
